data.text: Kik chunyi chandre nikech joma richo
nikech gibiro ner mapiyo mana kaka lum ner;
Gen kuom Jehova Nyasaye kendo tim maber.
Bed mamor kuom Jehova Nyasaye
Ket yoreni kuom Jehova Nyasaye;
Obiro miyo timni makare rieny ka ler mar okinyi,
Bed mos e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, kendo rite kihori mos;
Ritri kik ibed gi mirima kendo lokri iwe ich wangʼ
Nikech joma richo ibiro ngʼad kargi oko,
Kinde matin nono to joma timbegi richo ok nobedie;
To joma muol piny biro bedo margi
Joma timbegi richo chano timo marach ni joma kare
to Ruoth Nyasaye nyiero joma timbegi richo,
Joma timbegi richo wuodho liganglagi
To ligengligi biro chwoyo adundogi giwegi,
Gima tin ma ngʼat makare nigo
nikech teko mar joma timbegi richo ibiro kethi,
Ndalo mag joma kare ongʼere ni Jehova Nyasaye,
E kinde mag masira mopore ok ginibed moner,
To joma timbegi richo biro lal nono:
Joma timbegi richo holo ji gik moko to ok chul,
piny biro bedo girkeni mar joma Jehova Nyasaye ogwedho,
Ka Jehova Nyasaye mor gi yor ngʼato,
kata ka ochwanyore to ok obi podho;
Nyaka aa e tin-na mi koro adoko ngʼama duongʼ
Kinde duto gingʼwon kendo giholo ji gigegi nono;
Lokri iwe timo marach mondo itim maber;
Nikech Jehova Nyasaye ohero joma joratiro,
joma kare piny biro bedo margi
Dho ngʼat makare hulo rieko
Chik mar Nyasache ni e chunye;
Joma timbegi richo pondo karito joma kare
to Jehova Nyasaye ok bi weyogi e lwetgi
Bed gi geno kuom Jehova Nyasaye
Aseneno ngʼama timbene richo kendo makwiny
To ne okalo kamano piyo piyo nono kendo ne ok ochak onene,
Ne kit ngima joma onge ketho,
To joricho duto ibiro tieki,
Warruok mar joma kare aa mana kuom Jehova Nyasaye;
Jehova Nyasaye konyogi kendo resogi
